meanings.sent1: The paperhangers carefully measured and cut the wallpaper.
meanings.sent2: The paperhangers were hired to decorate the room with beautiful wallpaper.
meanings.sent3: The paperhangers joked that they could wallpaper their own houses blindfolded.
meanings.sent4: The paperhangers transformed the room into a colorful masterpiece with their skills.
meanings.sent5: Watching the paperhangers work was like witnessing a magical transformation.

meanings.definition: A group of people who hang wallpaper.
meanings.sent1: The team of paperhangers arrived early to start the wallpapering job.
meanings.sent2: The paperhangers worked together efficiently to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The paperhangers formed a union to advocate for better working conditions.
meanings.sent4: The paperhangers moved in perfect harmony, like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the paperhangers at work was a symphony of precision and coordination.
